SubmitComplaintPage.title: Submit Complaints
SubmitComplaintPage.complaintText:
Dear user,
You can follow up your complaints by one of the following methods:
- Fill out the form available on the contact page. In the subject section, select the "complaint" option.
- Contact support by phone number 02177415954
- Send an email with the subject "complaint" to the address info@gashtook.com  (The email must contain the registered phone number in the user profile and the complaint subject)
- Send an SMS to the number 30000123000724  (The SMS must contain the registered phone number in the user profile and the complaint subject)
Note that only complaints filled out with verified information will be reviewed.

Footer.address: Address: Ashrafi Esfahani Highway, Tehran, Tehran Province

Auth.notice-register: If you don't have an account, you can quickly become a member of Gashtook.
Auth.notice-login: If you already have an account, you can sign in to your account using the button below
Auth.register-rules: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions of use of the Gashtook Website Services and agree to all its terms
